channel.title: Sata desktop cd drive, to usb?
channel.description: I have found 2 enclosures on Ebay for this. Basically, I have a dvd drive Model:SH-S223, and I am trying to find a cheap enclosure so I can use it on my laptop. I would put it in my desktop, but it has all 3 slots full. I have tested the drive, and it works, My problems are, finding a caddy that isn't $50+ USD. Any suggestions?

item.title: Sata desktop cd drive, to usb?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You would also have to write a driver for it even if you did wire it correctly, you’d be better off to buy one.

make one
